title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, only the content within the tabs of the TabFolder and the Frames should be updated without any flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the control example
2. Resize the window vertically
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing excessively.
